help.desc: Shows all commands and their respective arguments, aliases and its description. If a command name is passed, it will show help about the specified command

ban.desc: Bans a specified member. If provided, sends a ban reason to the server audit log.

tempban.desc: Tempbans a specified member. If provided, sends a ban reason to the server audit log.

kick.desc: Kick a specified member. If provided, sends a kick reason to the server audit log.

prefix.desc: Changes the prefix for the bot on the server.

lang.desc: Changes the language for the bot on the server.

meme.desc: Shows you one of the 10 most recent submissions on r/memes

dankmeme.desc: Shows you one of the 10 most recent submissions on r/dankmemes

reddit.desc: Shows you one of the 10 hottest submissions on any provided subreddit

google.desc: Returns you a ready link for a Google search

wiki.desc: Gives you n ready link to an wikipedia article.

log.desc: Changes the channel for message logging provided by the bot.

blacklist.desc: Blacklists/unblackists the channel from message logging!

remind.desc: Reminds you after a set amount of time.

skybazar.desc: Shows you stats about a specific item in Hypixel Skyblock

math.desc: Safely evalueates a math expression. If you want to pass some variables, use a python dictionary, separated from the expression by ' | '

embed.desc: Creates a nice embed for you. An example can be found at https://pastebin.com/vX9PVLqf

editembed.desc: Edits an embed created with 'embed'. An example can be found at https://pastebin.com/vX9PVLqf

ticket_role.desc: Changes the role for staff who handle tickets

ticket_category.desc: Changes the category to create tickets in

required_perms: Ticket Creator or Assigned Staff Member

blacklist_command.desc:
Disables/enables a command on the server.

If `mode` is set to `add` the command will be added to the blacklist and therefore disabled

If `mode` is set to `remove` the command will be removed from the blacklist and therefore enabled.

ban.too_long: The reason should be 256 charachters long

command_error.missing_argument: **You didn't provide a argument that is required!**
command_error.bot_missing_permissions: **I'm missing the required permissions for this command!**
command_error.explain: Unexpected error. Report the error to: `marzeq_#2137`. Error id: `{}`
command_error.item_doesnt_exist: This item doen't exist! Maybe try phrasing it a little bit differently.
command_error.bad_format: This argument is in a bad format

guild_join.prefix: My default prefix is `--`. If you wish to change it, type `--prefix [new_prefix]`!

help.required_notrequired_args: [] are required command arguments, () are optional command arguments

reddit.submission_nsfw: This submission is marked as NSFW. Please enable NSFW mode on this channel to see this submission!
reddit.title: **Title**: {}, By: u/{}

reminders.too_long: The reminder should be 256 charachters long

bazaar.inaccurate: * Is inaccurate due to bazaar tax
